description:
Shotcut 24.06 open-source video editor is now available for download with support for AVIF (AV1) images, SVT-AV1 encoder, two new video filters, a new audio filter, and more.

The post Shotcut 24.06 Video Editor Adds AVIF Image Support and SVT-AV1 Encoder appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Shotcut 24.06 Video Editor Adds AVIF Image Support and SVT-AV1 Encoder

description:
PipeWire 1.2 open-source server for handling audio, video streams, and hardware on Linux is now available for download with many new features and improvements. Here's what's new.

The post PipeWire 1.2 Released with Asynchronous Processing and Explicit Sync Metadata appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: PipeWire 1.2 Released with Asynchronous Processing and Explicit Sync Metadata

description:
NVIDIA 555.58 Linux graphics driver is now available for download with explicit GPU sync support for NVIDIA GPU users on Wayland, as well as many other improvements. Here's what's new!

The post NVIDIA 555.58 Linux Graphics Driver Released with Explicit Sync on Wayland appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: NVIDIA 555.58 Linux Graphics Driver Released with Explicit Sync on Wayland
